Darkhawk/KUP/hydras/internal defences/Perceptor:

Darkhawk slipped, cursed =
and Shoot against Nightshift. Hydras Continued aiming and shooting against =
Nightshift. the internal defences turn on and opened fire against the intru=
der while Perceptor leave the Reseach area and sealed it and opened comlink=
 "Perceptor here!!! where is the intruder?"


*****************************=


KUp travel at high speed and he went towards the Tucson location arriving=
 shotly "Tucson?"he said while he arrived there "What the matrix is goin on=
"


From: Sandy 
Sent: Friday, April 09, 2010 10:26 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
Subject: Re: BlackFortress


  
Tucson and Night Shift were practic=
ally brothers, if not for their different colors. The same kind of courage =
embraced by Tucson Prime, sticks firmly to Night Shift who continues to dod=
ge the fire thrown at him. This was it, he wasn't going to run scared anymo=
re. Instead, he was going to use his quick thinking, agility and skill to t=
he best of his abilities and he was going to fight back. Several compartmen=
ts on his right gauntlett now reveal a string of tazer like shirukens which=
 when come in contact with metal, deliver a nasty sting. He says not one wo=
rd, dodging, ducking, crouching and finally tossing a couple of shirukens w=
hich sail quickly toward his assailents with dead accuracy! They weren't en=
ough to immobilize but they were enough to cause some pain.

" Well, I'm st=
uck here so I might as well make your lives more miserable while I'm down h=
ere. Trust me, I'm really good at it too!"

One thing that DID separate him=
 from Tucson, was his ability to be a wize aft. He transforms back into SUV=
 mode, and dumps a good amount of oil on the floor, just to make things a b=
it slick for his enemies.

" HAVE A NICE TRIP PUNKS!"

Outside, Tucson Prim=
e grows more annoyed at Cyclonus's voice. He wasn't there to give up, he wa=
s there to take back something that was stolen from the Autobot Matrix of L=
eadership. A power he had no right to command, a power he had no right to s=
teal. But yelling back wouldn't do him any favors. Rat Trap and Quickstride=
 look to him.

"What now Wheels?"

Tucson Prime looks to his comrades.

" I=
 - have a feeling it's something a little more spiritual than just yelling =
his name.."

He then replies to Kup.

"Kup, I need you here at the Black Fo=
rtress. Bring plenty of stasis cuffs with you, you'll need them. Shell prog=
ram or no shell program, we're taking Rodimus, Nightlight and Windlord back=
 with us. As soon as we capture them, I'll need you and Lord Elder to get t=
hem to Kenzo at the old Maximal base. Something tells me that the answers w=
e seek, lies within our own confines. I don't know why, but it's just a fee=
ling I have."

He then closes his eyes, to delve deeper into the power of t=
he Matrix which he holds within him.

" Primus, give me the strength to tak=
e back what has been wrongfully taken from us. A power which Cyclonus had n=
o right to steal. A power that is earned and not taken. He has betrayed you=
 Primus, he has betrayed the one commandment that all Autobot kind has abid=
ed by for centuries. I am here to redeem what has been wrongfully stolen fr=
om Rodimus Prime. Please, grant me the power to accomplish my plight."

Rat=
 Trap and Quick Stride watch with slight confusion.

" Huh? I thought he wa=
s gonna really rattle the parameter. What's he waitn' for?"

Quickstride al=
so looks on with confusion.

"Ummm, you're askn' the wrong Maximal. But I b=
et Lord Elder would know why."

Tucson remains in a trance like state, atte=
mpting to connect with the power within his body.

Rat Trap quickly transmi=
ts the events to Lord Elder via video link.

"Lord Elder, we're here, but w=
e dunno what's go'n down with Tucson Prime. Cyclonus asked 'em a question a=
nd I thought for sure he was gonna go after him with a vengeance. But he di=
dn't. He's right here, in some sorta trance like state. Hope those creepoid=
s didn't get inside his directory. Quickstride, how is he?"

Quickstride sh=
rugs.

" Nothn' yet Rat Trap, he's in deep thought. Sir, we dunno what ta m=
ake of this, we never saw anything like this before. Got any idea what's go=
ing on?"

They look to the video com link device on Rat Trap's arm as they =
wait for an answer.
--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercy=
clonus@...> wrote:
>
> Who: CYCLONUS, DARK RODIMUS
> Location: Black Fortre=
ss - Security
> 
> Rodimus looked over at Cyclonus, his crimson optics glit=
tering coldly
> as he observed the ex-minion, his gaze difficult to read.
>=
 
> Rodimus' frame was tall and straight, and although he had once been
> r=
edesigned as a Prime, there was still something about his build that
> was =
still lean, as if built for endurance and speed. His armor, even
> in the b=
right lights of the security chamber, still somehow maintained
> it's stark=
 black on gray motif, stylized flames dancing across his
> chest.
> 
> He g=
lanced over at one of the screens, the one that was displaying the
> activi=
ty outside with Tuscon and the other Autobot rabble standing
> there as if =
expecting them to open the base up and let them in.
> Rodimus chuckled soft=
ly for a moment, earning him a brief glance from
> Cyclonus. Rodimus was ab=
out to say something when Hydras' voice cut in
> . . .
> 
> > "We are under=
 attack!!!!! We must to capture Nightshift, pronto!!!! Scourge and Cyclonus=
 active the inner and exterior defenses... If the Autobot leaves the base w=
e will be forced to go to a fight"
> 
> Cyclonus tilted his head curiously =
as he, and Rodimus for that matter,
> looked at the screen that displayed t=
he screen in the throne room and
> the mayhem that was going on.
> 
> "Sir!=
?" Cyclonus sent to Hydras, "The base has been submerged
> underneath the m=
agma and I am activating the interior defenses."
> 
> Even as Cyclonus talk=
ed, a private message came to Rodimus from Hydras . . .
> 
> > "cover the r=
eseach lab, if the autobot ran towards it, intercept him"
> 
> Rodimus ackn=
owledged Hydras' message as he glanced up at Cyclonus. He
> hadn't appeared=
 to notice the message that Hydras sent. "I have some
> things to attend to=
." Rodimus said, his voice calm and yet still that
> undercurrent of aggres=
sion was still in it. "I'll be back."
> 
> Without another word Rodimus lef=
t the room, on his way to the research
> lab . . . and Nightlight.
> 
> Cyc=
lonus nodded as Rodimus left and then turned back to his consoles
> and scr=
eens, another lit up beside him as he activated it, this one
> watching Rod=
imus. Cyclonus had indeed been aware of the communication
> Rodimus had rec=
eived, and he watched his progress with keen interest,
> even as he kept an=
 optic on the other events.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>
